Quickstride arrives with Windlord and Uproar back in the meeting room as th=
ey take their places once again.  Quickstride wanted very much to stay put =
at the river bank, with Windlord , but duty did come first.

" I promise we=
'll go back there after the meeting is officially over.  I saw something th=
ere that I want to investigate, a possible location for a portable wind pow=
ered energy turbine. "

Uproar looks to Quickstride and Windlord. He was ve=
ry much interested in the concept of generating clean and efficient power, =
without harming the environment.

" Hey I'm all for that if ya need help, g=
uys. Wait a sec...  Quickstride, that idea of yours, do you realize how muc=
h power that turbine is gonna give us once you get it up and running?  Enou=
gh ta create a sizable shield and weapon system for the Ark...  Dude, that'=
s huge!  That's something the Preds don't have!  Go on, tell Leo Prime, man=
 if that turbine project is a go, like Rodimus said it is, imagine how many=
 lives you're gonna save."

He nudges his equine friend with a gentile paw.=
  Quickstride nods and transforms into robot mode.  Usually a very modest f=
ellow, he walks up to Leo Prime, with a holographic image of a wind turbine=
, completely portable, resting. In a recessed rockface of a near by cave, e=
tched in a very tall mountain which is surrounded by dense forest land appe=
aring untouched as the turbine powers itself with wind and uses a hydro tur=
bine system as backup.

" Leo Prime, Sir, if I could I have something to sh=
ow you, that could very well enable us to protect the parameter, environmen=
t, wildlife, and  Natural habitats that have established themselves here.  =
All we need are the energy resources to pull it off.  I think I have someth=
ing here that will enable us to do it all.  It's a turbine that runs on win=
d with an extension that runs on water as a backup power source when there =
isn't any wind being generated.  Best part is, it's completely portable and=
 designed for quick disassembly so we can leave the planet as we find it, c=
ompletely untouched."

He shows Leo Prime a simulation of the workings of h=
is invention.

Tucson Prime arrives with Talon, just in time to hear the pr=
oposed idea by Quickstride.

" A power source running only on wind and hydr=
o electricity.  Simple, yet natural, without harming the ecological balance=
 of this planet.  And did I hear you correctly, Quickstride?  Could that tu=
rbine give us enough power to protect and supply our reserves with enough n=
atural energy to fend off our enemies sufficiently? " 

Quickstride grins m=
odestly.

" Well there is a lot of testing that'll have ta be done, but if =
it works like I hope it'll work, it could, yeah definitely, it would give u=
s the home team advantage.  But as I show it in this simulation, location i=
s everything.  I know where I need to position this system and all I need i=
s some help to transport and assemble the turbine system.  I made sure to d=
esign it with light, but sturdy materials, just in case."

Tucson nods and =
turns to Leo Prime.  

" I think this is something we should strongly consi=
der.  When Rodimus and the others get here, we'll resume the meeting as you=
 intended to,  Leo Prime.  Quickstride, what you have here is something hig=
hly valuable.  Why didn't you propose this earlier?"

Quickstride looks to =
Tucson modestly.

Well, I didn't wanna interrupt Leo Prime or any of you gu=
ys.. "

Tucson shuffles Quickstride up front where all the leaders sit duri=
ng important meetings.  Uproar gives his buddy a thumbs up.

" Way ta go Qu=
ickstride.  You're part of the house now."

Tucson gives Quickstride his se=
at.

" Now as soon as Rodimus and the rest of the team gets here, I want th=
em to see and hear your proposal for the turbine system you're designing.  =
And please, don't be shy.  You have something Hydas doesn't have, a perpetu=
al and natural energy resource, plus the means to access it in a harmless m=
anner.  Leo, we need all the energy we can gather and this is our best shot=
 of getting it."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 12,=
 2011, at 3:42 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Ta=
lon/Windlord:
>  
> windlotd sighed he didnt liked to to come back so soon =
but he didnt said anythinng and mount up.
>  
> ************************
> =
Talon sighed and she followed Tucson
>

> Quickstride pe=
rks up his ears with a sheepish grin on his face, looking innocently forget=
ful about not going back to the meeting.
>  
> "Oops!  I knew I was forgett=
ing something, sorry Sir, bad short term memory, won't happen again I promi=
se.  Right, back to the meeting, I'll be right there in no time flat.  Hold=
 on Windlord, gonna have ta haul hooves back to the meeting room. "
>  
> Q=
uickstride quickly canters back to the Ark to return to the meeting, runnin=
g into Uproar as he too, bounds back into the Ark.
>  
> " I had a feeling =
the meeting wasn't over yet.  At least I can say that Tucson sent me ta do =
a favor for him."
>  
> Quickstride nods.
>  
> " So did I but I took a lit=
tle more time than allowed."
>  
> It doesn't take them long to return to t=
he meeting room.
>  
> Meanwhile, Tucson receives the message and replies a=
s he still holds Talon gently in his arms.  He too is caught slightly off g=
uard.
>  
> " Leo Prime, yes sorry I thought everyone could use some time o=
ut and I lost track of time..  Also, had a little processor disturbance, an=
d I needed a little time to reboot.  I'm fine now, I'll be there with Talon=
 shortly.  Sorry Talon, Leo Prime is right, we need to go back." 
>  
> Mea=
nwhile, Straight Shot gets the message to return to the meeting and steps o=
ut, clearing a tear from her optics as she nearly gets grazed by Rodimus.
>=
  
> " Ohh, sorry!"
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
> 
> =

 on TUSCON's comm center in his quarters. "Tuscon
>> Prime." It is LEO PRIM=

>> you send your teams out a=
nd you retire to your quarters. Is there
>> something going on that we all =
need to be aware of? And where is the

e of concern in his voice as well as

>> its sensors as well as his own to locate the wayward WH=
EELIE,
>> "WHEELIE! Where are you?" He called out as he zoomed in what he
>=

>>

>> In the room where the meeting was still suppos=
e to be taking place LEO
>> PRIME was still looking at the the bot with the=
 predacon signature,
>> still waiting for an answer to his last question.

ortly.  Sorry Talon, Leo Prime is right, we need to go back."
